bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: a) identical with with xie xie 泄瀉① , outflow. Su wen 素問 74: 清氣動下，少腹 堅滿而數便瀉 , “Cool qi moves below. The lower abdomen is firm and full and [patients suffer from] frequent outflow of urine and stools”.

b) Combined Designation of a diarrhea-type excretion of formless or liquid matter, including blood, pus, water, and watery exrements. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 32: 赤疽發額，不瀉，十餘日死 , “If a red impediment-illness develops at the forehead, without outflow , [the patient] will die after ten or so days”.

② Pathological Condition identical with xie xie 泄瀉② , outflow. Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 8: 卒得吐瀉、霍亂、 蠱毒 , “If one suddenly experiences vomiting and outflow , as well as cholera, gu poisoning…”. ③ Therapeutic Approach
a) of a large group of therapies opposed to bu 補 , “supplementation”, and meant to attack an evil. Su wen 素問 20: 實則瀉之，虛則補之 , “In case of repletion, drain it. In case of depletion, supplement it”.
b) Identical with xia xie 下泄 ④ , to discharge with outflow; to drain. Su wen 素問 5: 中滿者，瀉之於內 , “In case of central fullness, drain it inside”.
